Project information

  • Category: Third-Party Software Bot Development
  • Client: Coder53
  • Project date: 14/12/2022
  • Project URL: https://discord.gg/AjgSczS5

Project Description

To ensure 24/7 uptime for ShadewFare Discord bot, this project utilized an AWS EC2 instance running Ubuntu 20.04. We set up essential tools including PuTTY, FileZilla, Gitlab SSH Keys, and PM2. This configuration enabled our Discord bot to run continuously without interruptions, ensuring smooth execution of commands and functions. PM2 played a key role in maintaining the bot's non-stop operation.
